item.title: [PI] Timer [PI]
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Hello, This is my problem,

case 239: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.buydelay < 86400) { // 2 seconds c.getItems().addItem(620,1200); c.sendMessage("You Have gotten 1200 tickets."); c.sendMessage("Time: "+c.buydelay+" Out of 24 hours"); c.buydelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { //<<< When I add that c.sendMessage("Please Wait 24 hours to get tickets."); c.sendMessage("Time: "+c.buydelay+" Out of 24 hours"); c.buydelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

But when the timer is on it still gives you tickets
<< http://www.use.com/0a7425220481be736663

Read full topic
